frontMatter.title: Algorithms with Go
frontMatter.summary: Learn how algorithms work and how to implement them in Go

prev.title: pgModeler - PostgreSQL Database Modeler
prev.summary: Open source data modeling tool designed for PostgreSQL. No more DDL commands written by hand. Let pgModeler do the job for you!

next.title: Don't get stuck in the I am an X developer.
next.summary: You aren't a Go, or Rust, or Java, or Python, or JavaScript developer (unless you are writing those languages). In reality you are a developer who uses language X to solve Y problems. You can learn new languages and paradigms. Don't get stuck in the I am an X developer.
